Articles.Content:
Play [this](https://youtu.be/tqNqVQoo5uU) to you until you die

My barely-captured hill

You accidentally hear the song and die your self..

'That was easy'

I walk onto the hil becuase th last guy didn't clam it

my hill
By order of Lord Jebediah and the entrusted banstick powers I carry, I hereby claim this hill in the name of the moderation team.

I hereby stab thee in the back with Loki's Staff of Mischief, sending you into Odinsleep.

The hill is mine, heathens!

I dig through the bottom of your hill with a rock hammer. 

My structurally compromised hill of Redemption.

"Ummm... what was that? Oh no..." said someone. "Ru-" \*BOOM\*

![Boom-2.jpg](http://obeythemuse.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/Boom-2.jpg)

The hill is firebombed, creating a giant crater. BurntPhoenix's crater.

I dump enormous piles of earth into the crater because I *really liked* that hill, burying you in the process.

My mound of loose dirt.

\*scoops up some of the dirt into a jar.\*

I gotta jar of dirrrrt... 

I got a jar of dirt.

\*holds up the jar\*

Yeah, sorry. Hypnosis is a bit of a pain, isn't it? You're just imagining things.

I pack the loose dirt into a decently hill-ish shape. My hill.

Take out a bass cannon! Blowing you and the little pile of dirt

My vaporisated hill
Those cannons take a while to reload, I shall knock you out and take the hill.

I crash the *Byzantium* into your hill, leading to massive amounts of radiation and a weeping angel.

My very deadly hill.

I lead the Brotherhood of Steel into the radioactive ruins.

My hill.

The weeping angel sends you and your minions back in time.

My still deadly hill.

Call a time lord!

My hill

call the grey knights

My hill

Call the daleks

My exterminated hill

Dalek civil war.

My hill

great mod post train

my very strict rules hill

You walked into a hill, then you got killed because it is in fact a volcano!

![volcano.jpg](http://static.bbc.co.uk/earthscience/images/ic/640x360/natural_disasters/volcano.jpg)

Briansun1's volcano.
I fly out from the smoldering volcano and make a know hill on the base of the volcano. My hill.

The volcano, as it turns out, is a composite volcano. You are buried by the pyroclastic surge.

![Pompeii_modal_0002_pompeiiOnFire2.jpg](http://dayinpompeii.com/assets/twitter/Pompeii_modal_0002_pompeiiOnFire2.jpg)

(Art depicting the last hours of Pompeii.)

Then I managed to collect the ingredients (safely, after the blow) and use it to power my way to Mars. There I established a colony on a hill. My Martian hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2013-11-06T04:45:53Z" title="11/06/2013 04:45  AM" data-short="10 yr">November 6, 2013</time> by Designer225**

I use the dragon's balls to bring you back

My hill
The dragon eats you, all mine now!
